introduction: This webservice is the home of the sample directdemocracy judge. Judges are trusting participants by attributing a reputation to them. The reputation algorithm is documented here.
check-link: » Check the certificates granted by this judge.
propose-link: » Propose your own referendum or petition managed by this judge.
more-info: More information is available from directdemocracy.vote.
name: Name
propose: propose a referendum or a petition
areas-are-computed: Areas are computed automatically from your GPS coordinates
title: Title
question: Question
enter-question: Enter the question of your referendum
answers-explanation: Please enter one answer per line. A blank option will be automatically added.
trust-delay-explanation: To participate (sign or vote), a citizen should be trusted by the judge for a least this amount of time.
